task_background: Prepare the data migration command center for the critical transition from legacy RDBMS to NoSQL database systems.

tasks.task_description: Place the migration_dashboard_1 on the curved_workstation_desk_1.
Find the red USB drive labeled 'FINAL BACKUP' and save its contents.
Use the shutdown_key_1 to lock the manual_shutdown_panel_1.
Find the only flashing red device (abort_button_1) and uncover it using the paperclip_1.
